entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • AppThemeBinding doesn't work on .NET7 #13627
  • Weird code generation error. #13626
  • [iOS] Appshell tabs not appearing on iOS after screen rotation #13621
  • DynamicResource doesn't work when combined with AppThemeBinding #13619
  • Button border not displaying on non-windows platforms if BorderWidth is not defined #13612

Closed

  • Multi-window memory leak #10029
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Support for [JSImport] in MAUI Blazor App #13551
  • [Debug]: The framework should break to warn user more efficient #13460
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix bidirectional scrolling on Android #13623
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview
  • [Windows] Implement SearchBar CancelButtonColor on Windows #13622
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Bump Xamarin.Google.Android.Material from 1.7.0.2 to 1.8.0 #13618
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix shadow clipping issue using SwipeView #13616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix issue calculating the threshold using SwipeItemViews #13615
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Blank image when Source set to null or on image loading error #13614
    area/controls 🎮, control-image

Merged

  • [controls] fix memory leak in `Window` #13400
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Cleanup device tests #13624

Updated

  • [templates] Fix applicationId template option #13509
    area/templates 📄
  • Shell routing and Service registration automation #13402
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • Bugfix for text not properly aligned with radioButton when in RTL for Android #13610
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Fix syncing modal stack when the window is created/recreated #13025
    t/breaking 💥, area/modal, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Set a GroupName when creating new WinUI RadioButtons #13611
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Removing skip attribute from color validation tests #13266
  • Show keyboard on Android entry/editor/searchbar focus #12890
    area/controls 🎮
  • Catch InvalidProtocolBufferException creating EncryptedSharedPreferences #13599
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Button LineBreakMode property #10759
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Avoid to disconnect a disposed PlatformView on Android #12881
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Preventing NullReferenceException on WebAuthenticatorIntermediateActi… #12347
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Add helper method to get GetFirstChildOfType with null support. #13421
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix e-mail URI escaping recipients #13392
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix Picker alignment issues #13516
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-picker
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    proposal/open, community ✨
  • Fixed ResourceDictionary.ContainsKey method #13512
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Replace Shell sans-serif-medium magic string on Android #13544
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/fonts 🅰️
  • Remove "IsPresented/ShouldShowSplitMode" check #13497
    area/FlyoutPage
  • [RadioButton] Fix Issue with BorderWidth, Incorrect spacing in Default Control Template. #13407
    area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Backport yaml changes and update GitInfo #13607
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
